meanings.definition: A member of a gang that ambushes and robs people in forests and mountains.
meanings.sent1: The brigand emerged from the shadows, demanding valuables from the travelers.
meanings.sent2: The villagers lived in fear of the brigand who lurked in the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The brigand tripped over his own feet while trying to sneak up on his victims.
meanings.sent4: The notorious brigand was like a ghost, appearing out of nowhere to steal from unsuspecting hikers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the brigand's menacing eyes haunted the dreams of the townspeople.
